offer: BONUS Get More Packs FREE! Here's How:
restrictions: OFFER RESTRICTED TO SMOKERS 21 YEARS OF AGE OR OLDER.
order_instructions: See back of this order form for important information. Offer not restricted in selected areas. ORDER MUST BE RECEIVED BY OFFER EXPIRATION DATE OF 07/01/95.
requirements: Cut out 40 proofs from Winston Select packs. Please indicate which Winston Select brand style you prefer (that's only 20 Winston Select packs). No UPC codes accepted.
order_form: Completely fill out and sign the order form. Single or copies accepted. You must include your signature and birthdate.
mailing_address: Packs Offer P.O. Box 1127 Maple Plain, MN 55512
submission_instructions: Send proof in your own envelope to: Winston Select
offer_validity: This offer is void where prohibited.
respondents: Respondents from GA, WA who request a store-redeemable coupon good for packs of Winston Select cigarettes.
note: Your request cannot be processed without your signature and birthdate.
